entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:22 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -38.6°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 42. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:35 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clear. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 58 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:35 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
